ygData.subject: Re: Armours Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: We wiz can only wear clothes until we find magical one much* later. Meanwhile, we spend all our $ on scrolls..;( So far I only managed to buy 3 lvl 8 scrolls
ygData.messageBody:
We wiz can only wear clothes until we find magical one "much* later.
Meanwhile, we spend all our $ on scrolls..;(

So far I only managed to buy 3 lvl 8 scrolls - shock of ice, firebolt and
lesser shield. Need to buy finger of fire - all sponsorship welcome and
appreciated, hehe.


On Tuesday, May 25, 1999 2:30 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> usually ppl will shout to sell banded at EC. the tunic is 35pp though,
but I
> got mine for 20pp. heheh
